DOC.brief_summary: The objective study follow : 1 ) determine acute effect whole grain barley risk factor cardiovascular disease compare diet low whole grain , 2 ) compare effect whole grain barley whole grain oat determine response two grain similar .
DOC.brief_title: Acute Heart Health Benefits Whole Grain Barley Oats Healthy Men Women
DOC.detailed_description: Whole grain contain bioactive component may contribute reduce risk cardiovascular disease , may significant difference among whole grain source respect ability alter biomarkers cardiovascular disease . This acute study design determine whole grain barley improve postprandial lipid metabolism improve endothelial function . Further , determine acute consumption whole grain barley versus acute consumption whole grain oat result differential response respect biomarkers cardiovascular disease risk .
DOC.criteria: Men woman age 2570 year Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 19 ≤ 38 Willingness ability make schedule appointment clinical site require study protocol Do regularly consume breakfast dislike cereal breakfast Known ( selfreported ) allergy adverse reaction grain ( e.g. , wheat , gluten , barley ) Presence kidney disease , liver disease , gout , hyperthyroidism , untreated unstable hypothyroidism , certain cancer , gastrointestinal disease , pancreatic disease , metabolic disease , malabsorption syndrome Type 2 diabetes require use oral antidiabetic agent insulin Fasting triglyceride > 300 mg/dL Fasting glucose > 126 mg/dL Use cholesterol lower medication Blood pressure > 180/100 hypertension treat calcium channel blocker , direct act vasodilator , beta blocker Fingernails longer 0.25 inch beyond finger tip , unwillingness cut fingernail length endothelial function test History bariatric certain surgery relate weight control History major surgery within 3 month enrollment Smokers tobacco user ( 6 month prior start study ) Antibiotic use intervention 3 month prior intervention period History eat disorder dietary pattern consistent dietary intervention ( e.g. , vegetarian , low fat diet , high protein diet ) Volunteers lose 10 % body weight within last 6 month Unable unwilling give inform consent communicate study staff Selfreport alcohol substance abuse within past 12 month and/or current acute treatment rehabilitation program problem ( longterm participation Alcoholics Anonymous exclusion ) Other medical , psychiatric , behavioral factor judgment Principal Investigator may interfere study participation ability follow intervention protocol
DOC.keyword: Risk cardiovascular disease healthy men woman
